title: Eloping With The Lady
description: Eloping with The Lady is the fourth standalone Regency Romance story in The Lady series.As the firstborn daughter of the Allington family, Prunella bears the weight of her mother's social-climbing expectations. She knows the rules and has made a point of setting the best example possible for her younger sister Arabella. Prunella's first Season is going swimmingly and she expects to make a most satisfactory match. Until she meets George...All the stories can be read in any order. Though this is the fourth story, it unfolds before Taming The Lady.
author: Daisy Landish
